content.text: Trial 4/5, Stage 'xtraverse': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows a groove oriented in the horizontal (X) direction. The user's gaze is marked by a red circle around a section of the groove.

Given the groove's X-axis orientation, we'll align the local groove frame's X-axis accordingly. High stiffness will be applied along the groove (X-axis), with lower stiffness on the Y and Z axes.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [250, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
